TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyMap extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种方式，用于转换 Windows 窗体控件和 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素之间的属性值。

span.span: Provides a way to translate property values between Windows Forms controls and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类定义混合应用程序中 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 属性和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 属性之间的转换。Use the class to define translations between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] properties and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] properties in a hybrid application. 和 类上的 和 属性定义了从一种技术到另一种技术的映射。The and properties on the and classes define mappings from one technology to the other. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：使用 ElementHost 控件映射属性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788740\(v=vs.100\).aspx)和[演练：使用 System.windows.forms.integration.windowsformshost> 元素映射属性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788729\(v=vs.100\).aspx)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788740\(v=vs.100\).aspx) and [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the WindowsFormsHost Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788729\(v=vs.100\).aspx). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性的映射添加到 控件。The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the property to an control. [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)] 下面的代码示例演示如何替换 控件上 属性的默认映射。The following code example shows how to replace the default mapping for the property on a control. [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `source` 是 转换的属性的源。`source` is the source of the properties which are translated by the . 在 中映射的属性必须存在于 上。The properties which are mapped in the must exist on . 使用 上的当前属性值调用 委托。 delegates are called using the current property values on .

[!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性的映射添加到 控件。The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the property to a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置时，如果不存在 `propertyName`，则新的委托将添加到 中。When setting, if no exists for `propertyName`, the new delegate is added to the . 如果 `propertyName` 已存在，则会将其替换。If a already exists for `propertyName`, it is replaced. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检索 控件的 属性的 委托。The following code example shows how to retrieve the delegate for the property of a control. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset(string propertyName) cil managed

span.span: The name of the property to restore.

summary.span: 还原给定属性的默认属性映射。

span.span: Restores the default property mapping for the given property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对 有以下影响。The method has the following effects on the . - 还原已删除的默认属性映射。A default property mapping that has been removed is restored. - 已添加的属性映射已被删除。A property mapping that has been added is removed. - 已重写的默认属性映射将还原为其默认值。A default property mapping that has been overridden is restored to its default value.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetAll() cil managed

span.span: Restores the default property mappings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对 有以下影响。The method has the following effects on the . - 还原已删除的默认属性映射。Default property mappings that have been removed are restored. - 已添加的属性映射已被删除。Property mappings that have been added are removed. - 已重写的默认属性映射将还原为其默认值。Default property mappings that have been overridden are restored to their default values.
